/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of looking up towards the towering buildings and the bright blue sky. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A red fence runs along the right side of the street, providing a striking contrast to the greenery. A black car is parked on the right side of the street, adding a modern element to the scene. In the background, a tall building looms, symbolizing the city's architectural prowess. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of nature, architecture, and urban life in Beijing.
